headline: Don Jr. Endorses Eric Greitens for Missouri Senate
author: Taegan Goddard
sentences:
'”
He added: “I see sort of the sham stuff that they’ve thrown at Greitens now… So we’ll see what my father does in it, but I certainly have my own opinions.”

When CNN hates you, the Washington Post hates you, the New York Times hates you, it’s like, ‘That’s my guy.
Said Trump Jr.: “I see who the press hates the most, that’s usually the guy I like — it’s sort of like J.D.
Donald Trump Jr. used a radio appearance to endorse former Missouri Gov.
Eric Greitens (R) in the U.S. Senate race in Missouri.
